METHOD.name: databaseFullReset
METHOD.DESC: Deletes all records from the property bag and model tables.

PARAM.name: resetClientInfo
PARAM.DESC: true to clean the client_info table, false otherwise.

PARAM.name: resetLocalModels
PARAM.DESC: true to clean local (non-synced) models, false otherwise.

PARAM.name: zipName
PARAM.DESC: The name of the zip file

METHOD.name: haveLocalChanges
METHOD.DESC: >Returns true if any of the Rhodes model objects have local database changes that need to be synchronized, false otherwise.

METHOD.name: databaseFullResetAndLogout
METHOD.DESC: Deletes all records from the property bag and model tables. For examples, see Resetting the Database in Using the Local Database with ORM.

METHOD.name: databaseFullclientResetAndLogout
METHOD.DESC: Reset the Rhodes model database and logout. Equivalent to ORM::ORM.database_full_reset(true) followed by SyncEngine.logout.

METHOD.name: databaseFullResetEx
METHOD.DESC: Deletes all records from the property bag and model tables for the model names passed in parameters.

PARAM.name: models
PARAM.DESC: Array of models names to reset.

PARAM.name: reset_client_info
PARAM.DESC: If set to true, client_info table will be cleaned.

PARAM.name: reset_local_models
PARAM.DESC: If set to true, local(non-synced models) will be cleaned.

METHOD.name: getModel
METHOD.DESC: Javascript using only. Returns a model.

PARAM.name: modelName
PARAM.DESC: Name of the model you want returned.

METHOD.name: addModel
METHOD.DESC: Javascript using only. Creates ORM model.

PARAM.name: modelName
PARAM.DESC: modelName(STRING name). The name of your model.

PARAM.name: enable
PARAM.DESC: enable(STRING sync). Same as set(name,true). Sets attribute to true.

PARAM.name: property
PARAM.DESC: property(STRING name,STRING value,STRING options). Used to create properties on your model.

PARAM.name: addIndex
PARAM.DESC: addIndex(STRING name,ARRAY [col1,col2]). Add an index to your fixedSchema model.

PARAM.name: addUniqueIndex
PARAM.DESC: addUniqueIndex(STRING name,ARRAY [col1,col2]). Add a unique index to your fixedSchema model.

PARAM.name: belongs_to
PARAM.DESC: belongs_to(STRING name). Add belongs_to association to another defined model, for sync models. Comma separted String for more than one model.

PARAM.name: set
PARAM.DESC: set(STRING name,STRING|BOOLEAN|INTEGER value). Set an attribute to your model.

EXAMPLE.title: Add ORM model, create ORM object

SECTION.DESC: This example describes creating model and adding model object.

CODE.RUBY:
class Product include ORM::PropertyBag end
product = Product.create( :brand => 'Apple', :name => 'iPhone5', :price => 199.99)
readedProduct = Product.find(:first) readedProduct.brand #=> "Apple" readedProduct.name #=> "iPhone5"

CODE.JAVASCRIPT: // Get a model by its name after it has been added var productModel = Rho.ORM.getModel("Product");
